function.name: Login
function.description: ******************************************************************* ** Function Name: Login ** Function Desc: Logs into Devry App ** Function Params: ** LOGINPARAM - the Login ID to use ** PWPARAM - The Password To Use ** CODE SAMPLE: ** To Call this function, pass the parameters above as follows ** ** Created By: Andy Dowiarz ** Change Log: ** 11/??/2016 - adowiarz - New Function ** 01/24/2017 - jdaly - Added context switch before and after entering LoginID and PW ** 02/23/2017 - jdaly - Added parameters for Login and Password to be passed ** 10/10/2017 - jdaly - Implemented VISIBLE fucntionality to look for SIGN_IN and SWIPE ** up till it is found ** NOTES: This function must be called in NATIVE mode. *******************************************************************

function.name: CloseSafariTabs
function.description: ******************************************************************* ** Function Name: CloseSafariTabs ** Function Desc: Closes all of the open Safari Browsers ** Function Params: None ** Change Log: ** 1/5/2017 - jdaly - New Function. NOT FULLY WORKING YET!!!!!! ** 03/02/2017 - jdaly - XFramium 1.0.9 finally has fix for Long Press. Function now working. ** NOTES: ** - This function must be called in NATIVE mode. ** - This function will leave the Safari Browser open when done. You may need to re-open the app you are testing to bring it back to the front. *******************************************************************

Also changed tolerance for ios from 10% to 5% to ensure looking at correct thing. ** NOTES: None *******************************************************************
